preface.title: Preface
preface.para: StreamFlow is a system for managing the work flow of individuals or organizations. It follows the Getting Things Done (GTD) thinking in that it should be easy to create new projects or tasks, etc. It provides statistics that can be used by third-party reporting tools. As a bonus, it also integrates easily with external systems.
Other systems are terrible. They can be described here, thus motivating for the development of StreamFlow.
